title: DDOS Takes Down Blender... Cloudflare Saves The Day
description:
What kind of crazy person decides to DDOS a 3D modelling tool like Blender, what possible value could someone have in doing so, but likely nowadays services like Cloudflare exist along with offering some really interesting metrics along the way.
